SA09n998:6: yaḥ sarvadāparasukhaikaraso babhūva duḥkhena duḥkhamagamatparamaṃ pareṣām |
SA09n998:8: bicchi sāvayasi yasya śiraḥ parārtha sannayanapaṅkajatāmabāpa |
SA09n998:9: svārtha puna sitātapatrā pṛthvī babhūva niśiteva kṛpāṇadhārā ||4 ||
SA09n998:14: dharmāmbuvāha iva yo 'bhyudito hitāya dharmāmṛtaṃ jalamibaikarasaṃ babarṣa |
SA09n998:18: tajjāgaraṃ maraṇajanmajarāpahāri ye nāpnuvanti na pibanti na dhārayanti |
SA09n998:21: tacchāmanaṃ samadhigamya yadutsṛjanti mohasya tadvilasitaṃ paramāddhutasya ||10 ||
SA09n998:23: tuṅgāṃ prayānti padavīmanivartamānā bhumiṃ nijāmavataranti vivartamānāḥ ||11 ||
SA09n998:24: janmārṇabaṃ paramadustaramuttitīrṣuḥ śīlaplabaṃ ka iha hastagataṃ jahāti |
SA09n998:25: kāntāramadhyapatitaḥ kathamāryasāthīdaṣṭo na śocati ciraṃ supathānabhijñaḥ ||12 ||
SA09n998:27: muñcatti ye jinaguṇābalimantarāle begena te viṣamapātamadhaḥ patanti ||13 ||
SA09n998:28: ekākino 'pi manasā niyamaṃ prakalpya ye karmaṇā samuditena samunnayanti |
SA09n998:29: te sādhabo bhuvanamaṇḍalamaulibhūtāstaireva yānti gurutāṃ guravaḥ suśiṣyaiḥ ||14 ||
SA09n998:31: tejasvinaḥ sukhamasūnapi saṃtyajanti satyasthitivyasanino na punaḥ pratijñām ||15 ||
SA09n998:32: tiṣṭhantu tāvadiha sarvajanāpavādāḥ sarvāśca pāpagatayo nirayāśca ghorāḥ |
SA09n998:33: sadyo jahāti sahajāṃ prakṛti yadeṣa duḥkha tataḥ kimaparaṃ bhubi sajjanasya ||16 ||
SA09n998:34: yaḥ prapya nābamiba dharmamayīṃ biśālāṃ bhūyo jahāti padaṃvī munibhiḥ pralktṛptām |
SA09n998:37: so 'baśyameva taribaśaṃ masaḥ krameṇa sarvāḥ samāśca bisamāśca gatīḥ prayāti ||18 ||
SA09n998:39: āviśya garbhanilayaṃ nirayaṃ yathaiva duḥkhaṃ mahatsa sahate paripiṇḍatāṅgaḥ ||19 ||
SA09n998:40: kālakramena sa tato dṛḍhatailayantraniṣpīdryamāna iva yāti bhuvaṃ kathaṃcit |
SA09n998:41: sadyastathāpi yadayaṃ na jahāti jīvaṃ duḥkhopabhogagatidurlabhi tattadeva ||20 ||
SA09n998:46: sa tato'pi patatyacetanaḥ patito naiba jahāti bikriyām |
SA09n998:48: sa vihāya munīndrasevitaṃ supathaṃ yātyapathena mohitaḥ |
SA09n998:50: atha tasya balādanicchataḥ śirasi nyastapadā sunirdayam |
SA09n998:51: niśitaṃ palitāṅkuśaṃ jarā kariṇo hastipakīva yacchati ||25 ||
SA09n998:56: vidalanti tato 'sya sanvayo matirutkrāmati hīyate gatiḥ |
SA09n998:57: kṣayameti vapuḥ pariślaṣaṃ niyataṃ vardhata eva jīvitāśā ||28 ||
SA09n998:59: upagacchati yāmayaṃ daśāṃ narake sā yadi bhīma eva saḥ ||29 ||
SA09n998:60: kathamevamidaṃ mayā kṛtaṃ kathamevaṃ na kṛtaṃ hatā gatiḥ |
SA09n998:61: kathamevamayaṃ mayāstakaḥ śirasi nyastapado na lakṣitaḥ ||30 ||
SA09n998:65: vijahāti nijaṃ kaḍevaraṃ dayitaṃ yatnapareṇa rakṣitam ||32 ||
SA09n998:70: dūrānnirīkṣya vimalaṃ salilaṃ pipāsurabhyeti gāḍhatṛṣito yadayaṃ tadeva |
SA09n998:78: tāpārditasya dahanaṃ tu hitānilo'pi śotārditasya dahano 'pi karoti śītam |
SA09n998:81: aprāpta eva pṛthukaṇṭhadarīpra taśleṣmoṣmaṇā jalalavaḥ pariśoṣameti ||40
SA09n998:95: utpāṭayanti nayane sphurataḥ prasahya tatra sthitasya bakavāyasakaṅkagṛdhāḥ ||47 ||
SA09n998:96: teṣāṃ mukhaiḥ kuliśakoṭinibhaiḥ prasahya nidrāyamānavapureṣa kṛtārtanādaḥ |
SA09n998:107: ā cetaso jaḍataratvamupetakāyāstiṣṭhanti śītanarakeṣu bhṛśaṃ nadantaḥ ||53 ||
SA09n998:109: sitāsthisakalāṭalīracitabhūṣaṇaṃ bhīṣaṇaṃ pravṛttamiva bhairavaṃ sasujacarma hāhāravam ||54 ||
SA09n998:114: nirikṣya vivarāntaraṃ muḍurapāvṛtaṃ dūrataḥ prayānti kathamapyamī pramataduḥkhamokṣāśrayāḥ |
SA09n998:115: yadā tadapi ghaṭṛitaṃ bhavati karmapaṭṛrdṛḍhaistadā biphalavāñchitāḥ kimapi yānti duḥkhāntaram ||57 ||
SA09n998:120: te jantabo girinadījalalolajīvā auṣṭhyaṃ tadeva narakeṣu ta eva cāgniḥ |
SA09n998:121: karmāṇi tatkhalu tathā pariṇamayanti sarva yathā paramadāruṇamābibhāti ||60 ||
SA09n998:124: mleccheṣū vā narakapālasamavrateṣu tiryakṣu vā kṛtaparasparabhakṣaṇeṣū |
SA09n998:125: jātiṃ labheta yadi tatra tadeva śīlamāsevate patati yena punaḥ prapātam ||62 ||
SA09n998:127: cintāmaṇerapi samabhyadhikaṃ guṇaughairmānuṣyakaṃ ka iha tadviphalīkaroti ||63 ||
SA09n998:130: śvaḥ kāryametadidamadya paraṃ muḍūrtādetatkṣaṇāditi janena vicintyamāne |
SA09n998:133: narvaḥ prahṛṣyati jano na punarmamaitadāyuḥ prahīṇamiti yāti paraṃ viṣādam ||66 ||
SA09n998:139: kiṃ sā raviḥ suramaritsu biviktaramyatīrāsu yā śucijalāsu vane nadīṣu ||69 ||
SA09n998:140: viśālāḥ śailānāṃ viratajanasaṃpātasubhagā guhā gāḍhābhogā haritavanalekhāparikarāḥ |
SA09n998:141: sarittīrāsannā surajamadhurairnirjaravairna gamyāḥ lkeśāgnerayamiti vadantīva pathikān ||70 ||
SA09n998:142: māyāmarīcidakacandrataraṃgakalpāḥ kāmā jinena gaditā bibhavāḥ striyaśca |
SA09n998:143: svapnāntadurlabhitabibhramavipralabdhā bālāḥ patanti nirayeṣvapi yeṣu sattāḥ ||71 ||
SA09n998:144: āpātamāṃtramadhurā biṣayā biṣaśca ghorā viṣākakaṭukā biṣayā biṣaśca |
SA09n998:145: mohāndhakāragahanā biṣayā biṣaśca durvāravegacapalā viṣayā biṣaśca ||72 ||
SA09n998:146: kāmā viṣaśca biṣayāśca nitrupyamānāḥ śreyo viṣaṃ na viṣayā viṣamasvabhāvāḥ |
SA09n998:147: ekatra janmati viṣaṃ viṣatāṃ janmāntare'pi viṣayā viṣatāṃ prayānti ||73 ||
SA09n998:150: saṃsṛṣṭaṃ vrajati viṣaṃ biṣeṇa śantiṃ sanmantrairagadadharaiśca sādhyamānam |
SA09n998:151: yuktaṃ vā bhavati viṣaṃ hitāya nṝṇāṃ na tvevaṃ viṣayamahābiṣaṃ kadācit ||75 ||
SA09n998:153: śvabhre patatyatha ca nāstu ta eva lābhastadvatsukhānvitamatiḥ khalu jīvalokaḥ ||76 ||
SA09n998:158: sparśe sukhāsu padapātanatonnatāsu merornitambapadabīṣu ciraṃ vihṛtya |
SA09n998:163: karmānilakulagatiḥ kugatiḥ prayāti ko nāma tatra puruṣo na bhayaṃ bhajeta ||81 ||
SA09n998:165: duḥkhaṃ paraṃ yadamarā maraṇe vrajanti tanmānavā na jalabudvudalolajīvāḥ ||82 ||
SA09n998:169: satvānāṃ bhavajaladhau parilputānāṃ matsyanāṃ baḍiśamivāntakena dattam ||84 ||
SA09n998:171: krodhāpūrṇeḥ subaḍubhirayomudraraistāḍyamānā manyate taṃ paramiva sukhaṃ nārakā yadvadeva ||85 ||
SA09n998:173: bhandībhūte kṣaṇamapi nije duḥsahe duḥkhabaḍnau sardho lokastanusukhalabagrāmatṛṣṇāṃ karoti ||86 ||
SA09n998:174: yāvadyābajjagati sakale jāyate saukhyasaṃjñā tīvattāvadvaḍutaraśikho jāyate rāgabaḍniḥ |
SA09n998:175: yāvadyabadvisarati śubhā bhāvanā bhāvyamānā tāvattāvadvahalataratāmeti mohāndhakāram ||87 ||
SA09n998:179: tasyānṛtasya phalamugramidaṃ kavīnāṃ tāsveva garbhanilayaṃ padamī biśanti ||89 ||
SA09n998:180: kā saugatirjagati yā śataśo na yātā kiṃ tatsukhaṃ yadaśakṛnna purānubhūtaṃ |
SA09n998:181: kāstāḥ śriyaścapalacāmaracāruhāsāḥ prāptā na yāstadapi vardhata eva rāgaḥ ||90 ||
SA09n998:182: nadyo na tā na bihṛtaṃ pulineṣu yāsāṃ sthānaṃ na tajjagati yatra kṛto na vāsaḥ |
SA09n998:183: vyomnāpi tanna padamasti na yatra yātaṃ duṣpūraṇastadapi vardhata eva rāgaḥ ||91 ||
SA09n998:184: duḥkhaṃ na tadyadasakṛnna purānubhūtaṃ kāmā na te jagati yairiha tṛptirāsīt |
SA09n998:185: sattvo na so'sti jaṭhare śayitaṃ na yasya saṃsāriṇastadapi nāsti kathaṃ virāgaḥ ||92 ||
SA09n998:186: atyāyate jagati janmaparigrahe 'sminduḥkhe sukhe ca bahuśaḥ parivartamānaḥ |
SA09n998:187: nāsau jano jagati yo na babhūva bandhurdveṣoragastadapi tiṣṭhati bhīmabhogaḥ ||93 ||
SA09n998:188: yaiḥ sārdhametya hasitaṃ lalitaṃ pragītamekatra pītamaśitaṃ ca kṛtāśca goṣṭhyaḥ |
SA09n998:189: kālakrameṇa gamitāḥ kati ke'pi ramyā nītāḥ samāśca viṣamāśca daśāḥ kathaṃcit ||94 ||
SA09n998:191: saṃsārasāgaragatānapahāya bandhūnekaḥ prayāti yadi nāsti tataḥ kṛtaghnaḥ ||95 ||
SA09n998:192: aṅkasthitena śiśunā vivaśena yāsāṃ pītaḥ payodhararasaṃ praṇayānuyātaḥ |
SA09n998:194: yā saṃsthito'yamudare'pi kṛtāvakāśo yāḥ snehavilkavadhiyaḥ ślathamenamūḍuḥ |
SA09n998:195: tā duḥkhitā aśaraṇāḥ kṛpaṇā bihāya ko nāma śatrurapi gantumihotsaheta ||97 ||
SA09n998:196: bikīrṇe duḥkhaughairjagati vivaśe 'sminnaśaraṇe parārthe yaduḥkhaṃ tadiha sukhamāduḥ supuruṣāḥ |
SA09n998:197: kṣaṇaṃ kṣuttṛṣṇoṣṇaśramabigamarabhyanarucaḥ paraṃ kṛtvā teṣāmapi yadiha ka ivāsya pratisamaḥ ||98 ||
SA09n998:198: na sāramthairyā naiva ca nṛpatilakṣmīparikarairna dārairnāpatyairna surabhavane nāsuragatau |
SA09n998:199: kathaṃcitsaṃprāpyaṃ viṣayasukhaṃ bhogaparamairlabhante yā prītiṃ parahitasukhādhānaniratāḥ ||99 ||
SA09n998:200: svayaṃ ghāsagrāsaṃ paśurapi karotyeva sulabhaṃ yadṛcchā labdhaṃ vā pibati salilaṃ gāḍhatṛṣitaḥ |
SA09n998:201: parasyārtha kartu yadiha puruṣo'yaṃ prayatate tadasya svaṃ tejaḥ sukhamidamaho pauruṣamidam ||100 ||
SA09n998:202: yadālokaṃ kuvan bhramati raviraśrāntaturagaḥ sadālokaṃ dhatte yadagaṇitabhārā vasumatī |
SA09n998:203: naṃ sa svārthaḥ kaścitprakṛtiriyameva mahatāṃ yadete lokānāṃ hitasukharasaikāntarasikāḥ ||101 ||
SA09n998:205: sphuradvaḍnijvālā pramathitaśiroveṣṭananibhā yātante ye'trādruta iha puruṣāste sukṛtinaḥ ||102 ||
SA09n998:207: parārthe sphuṭanalinahāsāpi nalinī karotyeṣāṃ tāpaṃ ḍūtavahaśikhāsaṃhatiriva ||103 ||
SA09n998:210: aśaraṇajanatāraṇāya tīrṇāḥ punarapi vaitaraṇīṃ taranti dhīrāḥ |
SA09n998:212: iti sucaritarantaṃ bhūṣaṇaṃ bhūṣaṇānāṃ śivamamṛtamudāraṃ bhāsuraṃ bhāsurāṇām |
SA09n998:213: asulabhamakṛtajñairnandanaṃ nandanānāṃ bhaja samasukhahetuṃ maṅgalaṃ maṃṅgalānām ||106 ||
SA09n998:214: sugatavacanapuṣpaṃ sarvadā sebanīyaṃ phalati phalamudāraṃ puṣpameva drumāṇām |
SA09n998:216: visṛja viṣayānnītyākīrṇāṃ kṣaṇabyayasaṅgino bhaja samasukhaṃ sākāṅkṣaṃ kṛtāntabhayojkitam |
SA09n998:217: vikara timiraṃ mohabyājaṃ vimokṣayathārgalaṃ na khalu suciraṃ nidrāyante sadaśvakiśorakāḥ ||108 ||
SA09n998:218: vinayavisaro vīryaskandhaḥ kṣamāsamapalṝavaḥ śamathakusumaḥ prajñāśākhaḥ pradānaghanacchadaḥ |
SA09n998:219: praṇidhiśikharaḥ śīlacchāyaḥ praśāntiphalaprado bhava bhava marau tāpārtānāṃ tvamekamahādrumaḥ ||109 ||
SA09n998:221: praśamitarajaḥ śīlacchāyāvibhūṣitabhūtalo bhava bhava marau tāpārtānāṃ tvamekamahāghanaḥ ||110 ||
SA09n998:224: iti tigadatā yadupārjitaṃ puṇyaṃ mayā kiyatsugatacarite kṛtvā śradvāmanena jano 'khilaḥ |
SA09n998:225: satatasukhito ramyābhogaḥ samṛdvamanorathaḥ parahitarataḥ sarvajñatvaṃ prayātu tataḥ śanaiḥ ||112 ||
SA09n998:227: śucisurabhayaḥ sphullāmbhojairbibhūṣitabhūmayo dadhatu narakāḥ sphītāṃ śobhāṃ saśīkaravāyavaḥ ||113 ||
SA09n998:228: bijitaṃbirutamārānīkāḥ kṛtābhayaghoṣaṇā gaganasalilakrīḍā ramyā sameta narāmarāḥ |
SA09n998:229: jananamaraṇalkeśāyāsaprabandhavighātino diśi diśi sadā budvotpādā bhavantu samīhitāḥ ||114 ||
SA09n998:230: bhavatu jagatāṃ dharmāmodaḥ prabandhamahotsavaḥ suciraguṇitā mṛtyorbandhyā bhavantu manorathāḥ |
SA09n998:231: munijanakathāgoṣṭhībandhaiḥ samābṛtavarṣibhiḥ satataśiśiraḥ subhagacandrālokaḥ prayātu kṛtārthatām ||115 ||
